name: valtech.eng.ta.tab
description: Test Automation Bootstrap - the Valtech Engineering Cypress Template that is a kickstarter for new projects.

scripts.test_chrome: npx cypress run --browser chrome & npm run report
scripts.small_acc_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=acc --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=375
scripts.small_tst_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=tst --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=375
scripts.medium_acc_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=acc --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=768
scripts.medium_tst_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=tst --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=768
scripts.large_acc_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=acc --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=1440
scripts.large_tst_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=tst --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=1440
scripts.xlarge_acc_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=acc --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=1920
scripts.xlarge_tst_chrome: npx cypress run -e env=tst --headed --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=1920
scripts.run_browser: npm run run_spec -- --browser chrome & npm run run_spec -- --browser firefox & npm run run_spec -- --browser electron

author: Valtech
